summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; declaring a water supply emergency; imposing mandatory restrictions on the use of water; imposing an emergency rate surcharge; revising the rates of credit for qualified low-income customers; authorizing penalty surcharges and fines; amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 21.04.430, 21.04.440, and 21.76.040 in connection therewith; and declaring an emergency.
